Jordi Pont-Tuset

I'm from a small town near Girona, Catalunya. Currently in Zürich, Switzerland. Passionate about computer vision, technology, running, and mountains.

Twitter LinkedIn e-Mail G. Scholar

My CV

• I received a Mathematics degree and
Telecommunication engineering degree from UPC Barcelonatech.

• I attained a Master´s degree in Research on Information Technologies.

• I have a PhD in Computer Vision, supervised by Prof. Ferran Marques.

• I visited Prof. Jitendra Malik’s vision group in UC Berkeley,
supervised by Dr. Pablo Arbeláez.

• I collaborated with the startup Fezoo.

• I am currently doing an internship at Disney Research, Zürich,
under the supervision of Prof. Aljoscha Smolic.

• I am looking for new challenges for the future.
Can you offer me a job?

• Give me the STL library and a CVS repository on which to store the C++ code, and I shall move the world. Or was it about levers? ツ

• I cannot sleep at night if I have not committed my code or if I have not done enough unit tests.
